title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Just Walk Out by Amazon: How AI is Giving Your Lunch Break Back (BIZ201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Just Walk Out技术：AI如何让你的午休时间回归 (BIZ201)
abstract: Just Walk Out technology transforms how people shop, leveraging computer vision and machine learning to eliminate checkout across retail environments. Discover how Amazon implemented Just Walk Out across its fulfillment network, transforming break room experiences for frontline workers by providing food and beverage selections with 24/7 access and no lines. Learn about the technical challenges of deploying AI systems at scale—from integrating retail technology into complex operational environments to rolling out new shopping experiences to employees in industrial settings. Amazon leaders share practical lessons from deployment: co-creating solutions through feedback from operations teams, shoppers, and partners.
abstract_cn: Just Walk Out技术改变了人们的购物方式,利用计算机视觉和机器学习在零售环境中消除结账环节。了解亚马逊如何在其履行网络中部署Just Walk Out技术,通过提供全天候无需排队的食品和饮料选择,改变一线员工的休息室体验。了解大规模部署AI系统的技术挑战——从将零售技术集成到复杂的运营环境中,到在工业环境中向员工推出新的购物体验。亚马逊领导者分享部署中的实践经验:通过运营团队、购物者和合作伙伴的反馈共同创建解决方案。

presenter.name: Jaclyn Richeson
presenter.title: Site Procurement Operations, Head of Strategic Initiatives
